page.title: 10 THE PARK - CALNE
page.content: The park is a nice place to play but some people cannot play there because it is too far away.It has baby swings, very low swings and it has very big swings.It has a slide which you can sometimes slide off the end.There is a climbing frame which some children use as a space ship becasue it has seats in it.There is a roundabout which I never go on because I saw a little girl get trapped under it.There is a see-saw which never goes unless someone pushes it.There is a place where some adults play bowls. In the pavillion there is a bar and you can play darts or snooker.Nearby there are two tennis courts with a hut where tennis players can have a drink or get changed.You have to pay ten pence for the use of the court. There is a big field to play on which is also used as a rugby pitch.
